description: FDA Form 1571 is missing or incomplete
mitigation: Complete and include Form 1571 (Investigational New Drug Application) with all required information and signatures

description: Cover letter must be on company letterhead
mitigation: Resubmit cover letter on official company letterhead

description: FDA Form 1572 is incomplete or contains errors
mitigation: Review and complete Form 1572 (Statement of Investigator) with all required fields and signatures

description: Protocol document is missing or incomplete
mitigation: Include complete protocol document following FDA guidelines

description: Module 2 CTD summaries are incomplete or contain structural errors
mitigation: Review and complete all Module 2 CTD summaries according to FDA guidelines
